name: Doomsday Simulator
description:
Simulate what is like to fight on the Doomsday war from the Dream SMP in a platformer game style 

It contains:

  • 5 stages
  • inmortality option
  • a secret ending
  • level music by BitbyBitSound from his 8bit music booster pack :D
  • Playable with joystick

This is game has an average lenght of 20 minutes and can be considered difficult


Do you wish to support me in the form of monetary value? Paypal me!
